Using her [[Demonic Flute]], Tayuya summons the materialised spirits she stores in her [[Doki]], without summoning the Doki themselves. The spirits chase the opponent, stunning them if they hit.

[[es:Flauta Demoníaca: Onda Espíritu Fantasma]]
[[pl:Mateki: Genreiha]]
